pinyin: ji4 lai2 zhi1 , ze2 an1 zhi1

definitions.ji4 lai2 zhi1 , ze2 an1 zhi1: Since they have come, we should make them comfortable (idiom). Since we're here, take it easy.; Since this is so, we should accept it.; Now we have come, let's stay and take the rough with the smooth.; If you can't do anything to prevent it, you might as well sit back and enjoy it.;
